1. Click the START button.
 2. Estimate the time of 1 minute in your head.
 3. Press the STOP button.
 4. See your result.
Press the STOP button, if you think\n it was already 1 minute since you pressed the button.

You are not an owl neither a lark.
 You don't have habits of waking up very early or late.
 You can adapt to different conditions.
 That is your advantage!

Congratulations!
 You are an early bird.
 This is a rare personality type.
